n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>%USER_NAME%</SCHEMA> <NAME>STA_VW_CARETAKER</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ID</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>FIRST_NAME</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>LAST_NAME</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ADDRESS1</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>ADDRESS2</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PHONE_NUMBER1</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PHONE_NUMBER2</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>REMARKS</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> <SUBQUERY>with w_caretaker as( select usr.id , usr.first_name , usr.last_name , usr.address1 , usr.address2 , usr.phone_number1 , usr.phone_number2 , usr.remarks from sta_user usr join sta_user_role usr_rle on usr.id = usr_rle.usr_id join sta_role rle on usr_rle.rle_id = rle.id where lower(rle.name) = lower('caretaker') and usr.deleted_flg = false ) select "ID","FIRST_NAME","LAST_NAME","ADDRESS1","ADDRESS2","PHONE_NUMBER1","PHONE_NUMBER2","REMARKS" from w_caretaker</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
